articles.content: Thousands of fans are celebrating the Buffalo Bills' first trip to the AFC Championship Game since the 1993 season in a unique way -- by donating tens of thousands of dollars to a charity that Baltim… [+1551 chars]

articles.title: The chosen one: Slater receives four-star endorsement for Maroons job - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Four of rugby league’s biggest names have endorsed former champion fullback Billy Slater as Queensland’s State of Origin coach.
articles.content:
Four of rugby leagues biggest names have endorsed former champion fullback Billy Slater as Queenslands State of Origin coach.
